me.title: Who I am
me.description: I'm a Full-Stack Developer who loves building intuitive, scalable web apps. I enjoy turning complex problems into clean, practical solutions, whether it's modernizing systems or visualizing real-time data. Coding is both my craft and my favorite way to solve real-world challenges.

work.title: Experience
work.description: Currently, I work at Perenne as a Full-Stack Developer, modernizing a legacy app with Vue 3 and Quasar while building tools for a multi-tenant architecture and streamlined server management. It’s been a rewarding challenge blending performance, scalability, and thoughtful UX.

work.short: Modernized a legacy Vue2 app to Vue3 with Quasar, boosting performance and maintainability. Migrated to a multi-tenant architecture with dynamic API routing and built an admin dashboard for managing tenant servers and resource allocation.
description: Upgraded legacy Vue2 customer management application to Vue3 (Quasar), improving performance and maintainability.
Migrated single-tenant database to multi-tenant, developing a middleware API to dynamically route requests to isolated tenant databases.
Built admin dashboard features to remotely control tenant servers (start/stop scripts) and allocate memory/resources per customer.

work.short: Developed and deployed a real-time environmental monitoring dashboard with historical data analysis, enabling optimized lab conditions and rapid issue diagnosis. Built a scalable Node.js/Express system handling 500+ sensor requests per minute with a robust SQL database.
description: Designed and deployed a real-time environmental monitoring dashboard tracking temperature, CO₂, and lab conditions, enabling staff to optimize growing environments and diagnose crop failures.
Deployed comprehensive visual data charts via Node.js and Express for historical analysis, contributing to faster identification and resolution of incubation disruptions.
Optimized data handling system by designing a scalable database in SQL, leveraging Node/Express API to process over 500 sensor data requests per minute.

work.short: Engineered full-stack applications leveraging AI-driven services, real-time analytics, and structured data workflows, with a focus on user experience and scalable architecture.
description: Built and integrated GPT-based features to enhance user interactivity and automate content evaluation.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and backend services using Node.js and Express, ensuring robust and secure data flows.
Created interactive frontend interfaces with React and Javascript, emphasizing responsive design and modular architecture.
Developed real-time dashboards with dynamic charting and usage analytics to monitor application behavior and performance.
Architected systems to track multi-step processes, with emphasis on clean data modeling and user-centric workflows.

projects.title: Job App Tracker
projects.short: The Job Application Tracking Web Page is a centralized platform designed to streamline the job search process. It helps users efficiently manage and track applications through various hiring stages, includes an AI-powered resume review tool for optimizing applications based on job descriptions, and boosts productivity by keeping users organized and on top of deadlines.
description: Comprehensive Job Application Tracking: The web page offers a comprehensive solution for managing job applications, allowing users to easily track their progress through different stages of the hiring process.

AI-Powered Resume Review: An feature of this platform is the AI-powered resume review, which leverages artificial intelligence to cross-reference a user's resume with specific job descriptions. This helps applicants identify weak points in their application materials and make necessary improvements.

Efficiency and Productivity: The Job Application Tracking Web Page enhances efficiency and productivity in the job application process, reducing the chances of missing application deadlines or opportunities. It provides a centralized platform to organize and monitor job applications, empowering users to stay organized and focused on their career goals.

projects.title: ChatBot Tutor
projects.short: An AI-powered educational support system was developed to enhance student learning and curriculum oversight. It features a personalized chatbot that helps students engage with online textbooks, an administrative dashboard for real-time monitoring and curriculum analysis, and an integrated ecosystem that enables data-driven improvements in education.
description: Enhanced Learning with AI-Driven Support: Developed an advanced AI-driven chatbot tailored to elevate student comprehension of online textbooks. Utilization of natural language processing ensures personalized engagement to accurately address specific learning needs.

Strategic Oversight with Administrative Dashboard: Spearheaded the development of an Administrative Dashboard to offer real-time monitoring of the chatbots usage. This empowers educational administrators to identify and promptly address potential weaknesses within the curriculum.

Integrated Educational Support Ecosystem: Implemented a cohesive educational support system by seamlessly integrating the AI-driven chatbot and the Administrative Dashboard. This integrated solution enables data-driven decision-making, facilitating ongoing curriculum refinement and optimization.
